title: 3.4 Master Challenge 1
question: Write a program that uses the turtle module to draw a ball that bounces off the edges of the screen. The ball should change direction when it hits a wall and continue moving across the screen.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
